sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Trophy, Medal, Flame } from "lucide-react"; import { toast } from "react-toastify"; const unlockableThemes = [ { name: "Dark Mode", cost: 50, description: "A sleek dark theme for night owls.", }, { name: "Ocean Breeze", cost: 50, description: "A refreshing blue and teal gradient theme.", }, { name: "Sunset Glow", cost: 50, description: "A warm theme with hues of orange and pink.", }, { name: "Forest Whisper", cost: 50, description: "A calming green theme inspired by nature.", }, ]; function Rewards({ points, badges, studyStats, currentTheme, onPointsUpdate, onThemeUnlock, unlockedThemes, }) { const isDarkMode = currentTheme === "Dark Mode"; const isOceanBreeze = currentTheme === "Ocean Breeze"; const isLightMode = currentTheme === "Light Mode"; const isSunsetGlow = currentTheme === "Sunset Glow"; const isForestWhisper = currentTheme === "Forest Whisper"; const availableBadges = [ { name: "Priority Master", description: "Complete 5 high-priority tasks", icon: , }, { name: "Task Titan", description: "Complete 10 tasks", icon: , }, { name: "Early Bird", description: "Complete 3 tasks before their due date", icon: , }, { name: "Streak Star", description: "Maintain a 7-day study streak", icon: , }, ]; const handleRedeemTheme = (theme) => { if (points < theme.cost) { toast.error("Not enough points to redeem this theme!", { position: "top-right", autoClose: 3000, hideProgressBar: false, closeOnClick: true, pauseOnHover: true, draggable: true, theme: isDarkMode ? "dark" : "light", }); return; } const newPoints = points - theme.cost; onPointsUpdate(newPoints); onThemeUnlock(theme.name); toast.success(`${theme.name} theme unlocked!`, { position: "top-right", autoClose: 3000, hideProgressBar: false, closeOnClick: true, pauseOnHover: true, draggable: true, theme: isDarkMode ? "dark" : "light", }); }; return (

Rewards & Achievements

{points}

Total Points Earned

Your Badges

{availableBadges.map((badge) => (
{badge.icon}

{badge.name}

{badge.description}

{badges.includes(badge.name) ? "Earned!" : "Not yet earned"}

))}

Study Streaks

Current Streak: {studyStats.streak} Days

Keep studying daily to maintain your streak!

Redeem Themes

{unlockableThemes.map((theme) => { const isUnlocked = unlockedThemes.includes(theme.name); const canRedeem = points >= theme.cost && !isUnlocked; return (

{theme.name}

{theme.description}

Cost: {theme.cost} Points

{isUnlocked ? "Unlocked!" : "Not yet unlocked"}

{!isUnlocked && ( )}
); })}
); } export default Rewards;
